Key Match Events: Brayan Bello pitched eight innings of two-hit ball, striking out nine and walking one.
Tyler O'Neill hit a two-run homer in the eighth inning.
Kenley Jansen pitched a perfect ninth for his 25th save.
Post-Match Reflections: Brayan Bello said it was one of his better starts in the big leagues, especially because of the low score.
Alex Cora praised Bello's performance and his ability to stay focused.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Bassitt allowed one run on five hits and a walk, striking out nine before leaving in the seventh inning.
Jarren Duran singled to lead off the game, took second on a groundout, and scored on Wilyer Abreu’s single.
David Hamilton reached on Alejandro Kirk’s error in the bottom of the eighth, and Tyler O’Neill hit the next pitch over the Green Monster.
